data.actual_result: The string actually says "Slow mode is off." despite it being styled as "slowmode" everywhere else.
data.expected_result: The string should say "Slowmode is off."
data.short_description: Slowmode is stylized as "slow mode" in the Channel Settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Have access to manage a channel. - Enter the channel's settings. - Turn slowmode off if it is on.
